titleStmt.title: A Short discourse, evincing necessarily by ten severall solid and substantiall arguments, that the churchwardens & sidemen of England can not execute their places (according to that oath which they take at their admittance into their office) without sining against God and that in a very high nature

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
